00142    /* 
00143    * Constructor.
00144    */
00145    template <class BareBond, class BarePair>
00146    CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>::CompositeBond() 
00147     : bond_(),
00148       pair_(),
00149       className_("CompositeBond")
00150    {
00151       className_ += "<";
00152       className_ += bond_.className();
00153       className_ += ",";
00154       className_ += pair_.className();
00155       className_ += ">";
00156    }
00157    
00158

00160    * Copy constructor.
00161    */   
00162    template <class BareBond, class BarePair>
00163    CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>::CompositeBond(const CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>& other) 
00164     : bond_(other.bond_),
00165       pair_(other.pair_)
00166    {}

00168    /* 
00169    * Read potential parameters from file.
00170    */  
00171    template <class BareBond, class BarePair>
00172    void CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>::readParam(std::istream &in)
00173    {
00174       std::string label;
00175       Begin* beginPtr = 0;
00176       End*   endPtr = 0;
00177 
00178       // Read bare bond potential
00179       beginPtr = &addBegin(bond_.className().c_str());
00180       beginPtr->setIndent(*this);
00181       beginPtr->readParam(in);
00182       readParamComposite(in, bond_);
00183       endPtr = &addEnd();
00184       endPtr->setIndent(*this);
00185       endPtr->readParam(in);
00186 
00187       // Read bare pair potential
00188       beginPtr = &addBegin(pair_.className().c_str());
00189       beginPtr->setIndent(*this);
00190       beginPtr->readParam(in);
00191       readParamComposite(in, pair_);
00192       endPtr = &addEnd();
00193       endPtr->setIndent(*this);
00194       endPtr->readParam(in);
00195 
00196    }
00197    
00198    /* 
00199    * Set nAtomType
00200    */
00201    template <class BareBond, class BarePair>
00202    void CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>::setNBondType(int nBondType) 
00203    {  
00204       bond_.setNBondType(nBondType);
00205       pair_.setNAtomType(1);
00206    }   
00207 
00208    /* 
00209    * Calculate interaction energy for a bond.
00210    */
00211    template <class BareBond, class BarePair>
00212    inline double 
00213    CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>::energy(double rsq, int type)
00214    const 
00215    {
00216       double total = bond_.energy(rsq, type);
00217       total += pair_.energy(rsq, 0, 0);
00218       return total;
00219    }
00220   
00221    /* 
00222    * Compute force/distance for a bond.
00223    */
00224    template <class BareBond, class BarePair>
00225    inline double 
00226    CompositeBond<BareBond, BarePair>::forceOverR(double rsq, int type)
00227    const 
00228    {
00229       double total = bond_.forceOverR(rsq, type);
00230       total += pair_.forceOverR(rsq, 0, 0);
00231       return total;
00232    }
